title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Your community is a source of endless joy for you. However, you may feel like everyone has been too serious recently, and youre looking to liven things up today. Invite close friends or extended family over to your home for delicious food and delightful fun. Or, set time aside to catch up on the news with your favorite people. Although you might stumble into dark corners during a revealing conversation, keep your outlook positive and bright. Whenever possible, shine the light of optimism on the future. Daisaku Ikeda wrote, Good people gather around other good people. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
